reporter_caption.center: PIEART v. WATSON BROS. CO., 229 Iowa 393 (1940)

caption.center: LE ROY O. PIEART, Claimant, Appellee, v. WATSON BROS. TRANSPORTATION COMPANY

opinion.posture:
Appeal from Johnson District Court. — H.D. EVANS, Judge.Page 394
This is an appeal from an award allowing compensation under the workmen's compensation act. Opinion states the facts. — Affirmed.
opinion.attorneys:
Havner, Flick Powers, F.L. Galpin, and Margaret I. Cunningham, for appellees.
Miller, Huebner Miller and Charles W. Joiner, for appellants.
opinion.opinion_text:
This case was submitted on the same record as the case of Towers v. Watson Brothers Transportation Co. et al., 229 Iowa 387, 294 N.W. 594, filed this term, and this case is governed and controlled by that opinion. — Affirmed.
OLIVER, SAGER, HALE, STIGER, and HAMILTON, JJ., concur.
MILLER, J., takes no part.
